body: Hey guys, just wondering.. The credits that we receive in-game like Nebula for example, If we gain a certain amount of credits are we able to get something like Prestige or anything like that?
body_tagged: Hey guys, just wondering.. The credits that we receive in-game like Nebula for example, If we gain a certain amount of credits are we able to get something like Prestige or anything like that?
title: Gaming Credits

replies.body: No prestiges, but there are badges, mob disguises, and mostly lobby stuff. Badges are shown everywhere iirc.
replies.body_tagged: No prestiges, but there are badges, mob disguises, and mostly lobby stuff. Badges are shown everywhere iirc.

replies.body: You can buy badges, which look very similar to the prestige stars. You can also customize the colour of these stars.
replies.body_tagged: You can buy badges, which look very similar to the prestige stars. You can also customize the colour of these stars.
